files.name: temple
files.content:
This is the Nallur temple. 
It is located in Jaffna North. 
Every year many tourists visit this place.

files.name: beach
files.content:
This is the KKS Beach. 
It is located in Kankesanthurai. 
This is a wonderful place in Jaffna.

files.name: historical
files.content:
This is the Nilavarai Well. 
It is located in Puttur. 
It is known for its deep natural underground water.

files.name: temple
files.content:
This is the Temple of the Tooth Relic. 
Located in the city of Kandy. 
It is a sacred site for Buddhists.

files.name: lake
files.content:
This is the Kandy Lake. 
It is located next to the temple. 
A peaceful spot for evening walks.

files.name: garden
files.content:
This is the Peradeniya Botanical Garden. 
Famous for its collection of orchids and palm trees.

files.name: fort
files.content:
This is the Galle Fort. 
Built by the Portuguese and Dutch. 
It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

files.name: beach
files.content:
This is Unawatuna Beach. 
A beautiful sandy beach ideal for swimming and snorkeling.

files.name: museum
files.content:
This is the National Maritime Museum. 
Located inside Galle Fort. 
Displays artifacts related to sea life and trade.

files.name: park
files.content:
This is Victoria Park. 
Located in Nuwara Eliya town. 
Popular for flowers and relaxing walks.

files.name: mountain
files.content:
This is Pidurutalagala. 
The highest mountain in Sri Lanka. 
Access is restricted but visible from the town.

files.name: garden
files.content:
This is Hakgala Botanical Garden. 
Located near Nuwara Eliya. 
Known for roses, orchids, and cool climate plants.

files.name: temple
files.content:
This is Koneswaram Temple. 
Located on Swami Rock in Trincomalee. 
Overlooks the Indian Ocean and has historic value.

files.name: beach
files.content:
This is Nilaveli Beach. 
A pristine white-sand beach ideal for diving and relaxing.

files.name: harbor
files.content:
This is Trincomalee Natural Harbor. 
One of the world's finest deep-water harbors. 
Used for both commercial and military purposes.
